issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Reproducer*
{code:sql}
set hive.support.concurrency=true;
set hive.txn.manager=org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.lockmgr.DbTxnManager;

CREATE TABLE table_acid(d int, tz timestamp with local time zone)
    clustered by (d) into 2 buckets stored as orc TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true');
{code}

*Error*
{code:sql}
FAILED: Execution Error, return code 1 from org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.DDLTask. java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Unknown primitive type TIMESTAMPLOCALTZ
{code}

*Error stack*

fields.summary: CREATE TABLE (ACID) doesn't work with TIMESTAMPLOCALTZ column type
